column4: i just successfully made my webcam work in linux using the spca5xx driver
it worked well when I tried the command spcaview -d /dev/video1 in the terminal but the thing is, gnomemeeting can only see /dev/video0...how can i make it work in gnome meeting?
ahh.. i have a logitech quickcam and can't get it to work with hoary.  had it working under all 2.4 kernels and the first few 2.6.. but not since then :(
